title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, June 7, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of novelist Louise Erdrich (1954), who said, “The point of books is to have way too many but to always feel you never have enough.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of novelist Louise Erdrich (1954), who said, “The point of books is to have way too many but to always feel you never have enough.”
